column4: how to enable PHP script to be execute in html in apache2, plz help me, thank you all.
install the php5 package with mod_php5

: thanx for the info, i already did that, i can run php as well, but i think i need to change some of the apache2 directives in order to make php execute in html files, it would be easy for me if i can find .htaccess in /var/www, but unfortunately i cant find it, any solution, thanx
no, php doesn't execute in html files, it executes as a script or "php" file you can embed these into html files, that's nothing to do with ubuntu, ask in ##php
